hints.content:
To find how long $\blueE{\text{Harry's wand}}$ and $\maroonD{\text{Ron's wand}}$ are together, we need to find the total. So, we add.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8c34747f0b71ed56607820e2cc78bf3e62471411)

$\blueE{29}\text{ cm}+\maroonD{24}\text { cm} = \purpleD{\Large\Box}$

Let's add to find the total.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5d50b7bf8a4082846d963f4e1de6b10bd1be285f)

$\blueE{29}\text{ cm}  + \maroonD{24}\text{ cm} =\purpleD{53}\text{ cm}$
Harry and Ron's wands measure $\purpleD{53} \text{ cm}$ together.

question.content:
Harry and his wizard friends measured the lengths of their magic wands.

Wand | Length  
- | - | -
Harry | $29 \text { cm}$ 
Ron | $24 \text { cm}$ 
Hermione |  $31 \text { cm}$ 
Ginny |  $26 \text { cm}$ 

**What is the length of Harry and Ron's wand together?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] $\text{cm}$
